Nice City and Countryside Tours, Easter day, 20 April 2003

---There are more yachts than yacht slips available so you must apply for one early.---
---A candy factory in Nice. Fruit is soaked in sugar water to make crystalized fruit---
---Guide explaining how crystalized fruit is made.---

---Unfotunately it rained when we saw the fruit-flower market.---
---The provencial market is held every day except Mondays when it turns into a flea market.---
---The market is in the Cours Saleya, a long rectangle running parallel to the sea.---

---No one stops shoppers of produce and flowers. When the rains came, we huddled under an umbrella and talked with an herb seller in sign language!---
---The flowers are breathtaking!---
---Many cafes line the square---
